short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Readable Shortcuts allows you to create readable personalized shortcuts for your links that are easy to recall.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Readable Shortcuts simplifies your browsing experience by allowing you to assign intuitive names or keywords to your preferred websites and files. Once you've added a shortcut, accessing the associated link becomes as easy as typing “sc” + [space] + its name into your browser's address bar.

Key Features:
1.	Effortless Link Management: Readable Shortcuts provides an intuitive interface where you can effortlessly manage your shortcuts. Add new links, edit existing ones, or remove shortcuts with just a few clicks.

2.	Customizable Shortcuts: Tailor your shortcuts to match your preferences. Assign unique names or keywords to your links, making them memorable and easy to recall.

3.	Lightning-Fast Access: Forget about bookmark folders and lengthy URLs. By typing a shortcut name directly into your browser's address bar, you can instantly navigate to the desired website without any hassle.

4.	Sync Across Devices: Readable Shortcuts synchronizes seamlessly with your Google Account, allowing you to access your shortcuts from any device with the extension installed in Chrome. Whether you're on your desktop or laptop, your customized shortcuts are always at your fingertips.

5.	Privacy: Rest assured that Readable Shortcuts prioritizes your privacy. The extension operates locally on your device, ensuring that your browsing habits remain confidential and secure.

6.	User-Friendly Interface: Readable Shortcuts boasts a clean and intuitive interface, making it easy for users of all levels of technical expertise to set up and manage their shortcuts effortlessly.

Enhance your browsing efficiency and reclaim valuable time with Readable Shortcuts. Streamline your access to frequently visited websites by creating personalized shortcuts that open with a quick keystroke. Install Readable Shortcuts today and experience a new level of convenience in your web browsing journey.
